The following state arguments are supported:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Priority</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The priority of the Private Zone Record. At present, only can "MX" record support it. Valid values: [1-50]. Default to 1.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Record<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The Private Zone Record ID.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Resource<wbr>Record</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The resource record of the Private Zone Record.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ttl of the Private Zone Record.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The type of the Private Zone Record. Valid values: A, CNAME, TXT, MX, PTR.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Value</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The value of the Private Zone Record.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Zone<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The name of the Private Zone Record.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
